plist.dict:
Label ai.muavin.relay ProgramArguments
__BUN__ run __REPO_ROOT__/src/relay.ts
WorkingDirectory __HOME__/.muavin EnvironmentVariables
PATH __HOME__/.local/bin:__HOME__/.bun/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin HOME __HOME__
RunAtLoad __RUN_AT_LOAD__ KeepAlive
StandardOutPath __HOME__/Library/Logs/muavin-relay.log StandardErrorPath __HOME__/Library/Logs/muavin-relay.error.log ProcessType Interactive ThrottleInterval 10 ExitTimeOut 15
